post.body: you need to be one of the first 3. like, you need to answer quickly.
my best internet marketing posts series is not a competition. it comes from peer suggestion + my own collection throughout the yr
thanks! i quoted you on an update to the post on etiquette. http://cli.gs/2nt2E5. lack of conversational value and exclusion=bad
the person who keeps FB chatting me is 29. he doesn't use IM. @mvandemar regular IM = AIM, yahoo, MSN, etc? @sadiavt popups!
internet marketing posts of 2008 is underway. i'm still taking submissions too. it's already taken 15+ hours.
they don't have the last name SEO. they want to identify themselves as a search engine optimization expert. FB isn't the place.
brian's twitter stream is private w/that little lock. he prefers it that way. ;) but i'll tell him you say hi. @askfrasco hi!
i agree with @streko. it hurts :) @krizma i don't know for sure, all i know is that twitter removed dead accounts. maybe bots.
no problem. their dell twitter page is helpful, but it looks like it's sales-oriented. i'm a customer and i'd like tech support
actually yes it was. i haven't exactly seen people talk about Dell as an active presence on twitter. thx all for the responses!
mine is in 4 days. beat that!
secret millionaire is really emotional. i am all teary eyed.
going to watch secret millionaire. nice to see that there's still good in this world!
for a blog post i'm writing: how do you define success in 140 characters or less?
it looks like i'm never going to search conferences again. end of an era.
so @namecheap, my domain provider (and the best one -- don't use godaddy), is running a contest for free domain dollars. pretty sweet.
lately, the question has been why advertisers/sites aren't creating widgets since it's a cheap marketing tool. why not? most widgets suck.
customer service reps should have a GENDER display box that tells them gender of the caller. this guy keeps calling me SIR. happens often!
the best internet marketing posts of 2008 post is underway. see 2007's here: http://cli.gs/zHmJHv
got a favorite post on SEO, social media, twitter/facebook/linkedin, business/marketing, viral marketing, or link building? TELL ME ASAP!
my computer has been ridiculous for the past few days. i think i need to reformat :(
regarding the best internet marketing posts of 2008 list, YES, please self-promote. all blog posts are good!!!!!
i'm starting to collect posts for the BEST INTERNET MARKETING POSTS OF 2008. got any?
does it drive you crazy when a person asks to retweet his stuff every day?! don't people GET social media?
I'm at my husband's 10 year high school reunion. It's also his birthday!
tomorrow is my husband's birthday. he's 29 on the 29th. HAPPY DAY.
CNN writes about tweeting the terror #mumbai http://www.cnn.com/2008/WORLD/asiapcf/11/27/mumbai.twitter/index.html
has anyone here done any black friday shopping?!
fedora 10 upgrade using preupdate went well. nice!
i asked a few days ago how you define success. many responded. now see your answers and participate in the discussion: http://cli.gs/Vr9uma
mozilla's brand new community store is pretty sweet. http://communitystore.mozilla.org/
i'm still looking for highly recommended posts for the Internet Marketing Best Posts of 2008. check out last year's: http://cli.gs/zHmJHv
why is it on the day i ask to provide me with egregious abuses of social media, people decide instead to further abuse SM relationships?
to revise my previous tweet (see my question), i'm looking for social network SPECIFIC violations. and yes, this is for a blog post. ;)
QUESTION: on ANY social network (Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, you name it), what are the most BLATANT crimes in social media etiquette?
i blogged about "the secret millionaire" on Lateral Action: http://cli.gs/3g6UgA
i love it when PR firms send me irrelevant story pitches and then get mad when i don't actually respond to them.
why do some companies REQUIRE notarized signatures? notaries in my experience do nothing but sit there.
the feedburner team confirmed that it wasn't recording bloglines subs since sunday. i usually check search.twitter but no one complained.
actually, @mooeypoo, thanks for catching that. he has 2.6.5, i have 2.7.
i upgraded my husband's WP 2.3 to 2.5 earlier today. he flipped with the dashboard change. i just upgraded 2.5 to 2.7 on my end. WOW. NUTS!
i wish delicious would let me choose how long i should be logged on. 2 weeks is not enough. how about "keep me logged on until i log out"?
interesting answers regarding facebook chat. 16 don't use it, 2 do on the site, and 3 do via digsby/adium. as for me, i prefer regular IM.
just curious: do people here *really* use Facebook chat? it's so intrusive.
just added another sin to my social media etiquette post thanks to @rishil. if your last name is "seo" on FB, no thx! http://cli.gs/2nt2E5
social media etiquette sin #384832: deleting your tweet after you sent it to me and after i respond to it. cmon :P
aww my husband is participating on twitter. hi brian :)
ugh, how annoying. i reformatted less than a WEEK ago and i just got a BSOD. i didn't even reformat for that reason.
social media sins exposed (thanks for your contributions!). the blog post is live: http://cli.gs/2nt2E5 - if used your insight, i thanked u
bluelithium founder grubaksh chahal was on secret millionaire tonight. but the show says they give away at least $100k. he gave $90k.
the @pistachio blog is aiming to raise $25k for kids in poor circumstances. donate $2 or find out how to help for free http://cli.gs/Qvr2qT
congrats! aviary.com is out of private beta :) it's a sweet online photo editing application!
mashable nyc event on january 15, 2009: are you going to come? tickets are on sale now. http://tr.im/mashablenewyear
earlier this week, i shared 12 tips from biz pros on how they took their company to the next level. now win a printer: http://cli.gs/biztip
so how many times has your GPS told you to turn the wrong way onto a one-way street? apparently in NYC with a garmin, it happens often.
ok, i love you people. especially @footinmouth @elyrosenstock (i don't, twitter removed them & my count went down) @thekenjones @newmediazoo
dang! did i really have 200 bots following me on twitter? now i'm feeling a bit lonely.
12 internet experts offer the one tip that took their business to the next level. some great insights in this article: http://cli.gs/biztip
kudos to dell. a lot of you came forward after my "i'm on the phone with support and ranting via twitter" tweets last night :) thanks all!
numerous youtube video producers are looking to boycott youtube on 12/19. http://tinyurl.com/58x6ko (thx @cgt2099)
1981 police killing of Adam Walsh solved. http://cli.gs/mRJzYs - This happened in Hollywood, FL, where I lived my entire childhood (17yrs)
dear Dell, when you come back, please let me know so that i can contact you if i have ongoing tech support woes. these calls are too long :(
and yes i know dell made $1 million in revenue. but tech support issues? they're not as visible as comcast & even verizon & jetblue & others
does anyone know if Dell is on Twitter?
love it when local companies join twitter! @tastidlite is all over NYC and now it's on Twitter. @kosher1 (kosher.com) is here too. FUN!
oh yes! more contests! @ohnuts has U Tweet We Sweet too. their candy ROCKS.
lotsa cool holiday contests: @namecheap has an hourly trivia contest, @mimobot does word of the day, and @bloggled: http://cli.gs/WgBydH
finally! after 4 weeks, my "best internet marketing posts of 2008" is live. http://cli.gs/best2008
thanks for the birthday wishes everyone :) i'll be posting a gift on my blog later today ;)
seems @pixly doesn't get it. why would anyone want to tweet about a service before they even tried it?! that kind of opt-in is dumb.
i'm wrapping up my "best internet marketing posts of '08" soon and i want more recommendations. self promo is ok. HURRY! need good posts :)
called my precinct to file a police report. operator on line says "call 911." "but it's not an emergency." "well, it's a crime," he says.
first pixly spams twitter with updates, now twply. guys, don't volunteer your password to these services. they are tweeting for you! look!
happy 2009. first big news of the year: someone smashed our car window! w00t! I LOVE THIS YEAR ALREADY!
happy 2009 everyone!
thank you pixly for making a tweet i didn't authorize. yes you asked for my username and password, but i trusted that you wouldn't abuse it.
behind the scenes at yesterday's @israelconsulate press conference: http://cli.gs/VqEQbg #AskIsrael
hashtags.org contact form only refreshes the page, and hashtags.com seems to be saturated with #rsstotwitter spam. poor quality indeed.
i <3 you all too, you know.
the israeli consulate will start their press conference via twitter in 10 min at 1PM EST. http://twitter.com/IsraelConsulate #AskIsrael
the twitter account to follow for tomorrow's Twitter press conference regarding israel incidents is http://twitter.com/IsraelConsulate
Israeli Consul David Saranga (NYC) answers ur questions in a citizens 'press' conference on Twitter, Tue Dec 30, 1-3pm EST #AskIsrael #gaza
i love garmin GPS navigators that actually speak street names. ST for "street" becomes "ess-tee." EXPWY for "expressway" is ex-pwee!
wow. it's a real sad day when people feel the need to use Google AdWords to advertise their twitter accounts http://cli.gs/dyeMu2
it may be a holiday and all, but the spammers are not on a vacation. seriously - the only email hitting in my inbox today has been crap.
